Definition: In this task, you will be given a review of a food product from Amazon. Your task is to rate the product on a scale of 1-5, based on the review. 1 corresponds to "extremely poor", 2 corresponds to "poor", 3 corresponds to "neutral or mixed", 4 corresponds to "good", and 5 corresponds to "extremely good".
